lead_paragraph: Real Madrid have enviously looked on as Barcelona claimed six La Liga titles in the last eight years, but Zinedine Zidane's side can take a huge step towards a first crown since 2012 with victory over their bitter rivals at the Nou Camp on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Real Look to Stamp Authority on Title Race With Clasico Victory
headline.main: Real Look to Stamp Authority on Title Race With Clasico Victory
